page.title: 18School long ago.
page.content: Memoirs of an old teacher. (18th JUNE 1897 -) school dismissed at 4pm for one weeks special holiday on account of her Majestys Jubilee.(13th may 1890-)I had occasion to punish two girls for continued rudeness to the teacher . The punishment consisted of 1 stroke across the hand with a strap for 1 girl and 1 on each hand with a cane for the other girl.(My school 1985) school starts 8.50am lunch time 1 hour 10 minutes, finishes 3.30pm. There are many culbs held outside lesson time,cricket,football,gym, computer, rugby, netball etc.There have been football tours of Belgium, holidays in France ,weekend camps at the Yorkshire Dales or coast.At lunch time most of the children like to play at racing to prepare for the sports day. Most children eat school meals, but some have packed lunches or gohome
